long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plays a sound on each network request. Listen to your website and hear how it performs. Different sounds for different request types (same-origin, cross-origin, tracking, malware). The bigger the file, the higher the pitch. 

GitHub: https://github.com/combatwombat/netbeep
